tool_description: A Huge data scraper from the amazon website, for increasing sales, getting more information on products,  and start to scaling your business.
name: Big Data Amazon
title: Big Data Amazon

api_list.name: Search for product
api_list.description: List all products that match your search on it!
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://big-data-amazon.p.rapidapi.com/search/laptop"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "big-data-amazon.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://big-data-amazon.p.rapidapi.com/search/{searchquery}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "big-data-amazon.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
